text: Inene, abangakholwanga ngabo bathi uAllâh nguMesiya, unyana kaMariyam. Yithi wena (Muhammad): “Ngubani na ngoko onentwana yamandla okuchasana noAllâh ukuba Ebenokusuka amtshabalalise uMesiya, unyana kaMaryam, nomama wakhe, nabo bonke abo basemhlabeni? Yaye loluka-Allâh ulongamelo lwamazulu nomhlaba nako konke okuphakathi kwawo. Udala oko Athande ukukudala kwaye uAllâh Uyakwazi ukwenza izinto zonke
